sentences.sentence: Two people are at a French château.
sentences.translation: 这两位路人在一座法国古堡中就餐。

sentences.sentence: The château, they called it. A polite way of saying "the bughouse."
sentences.translation: 他们叫它“庄园”，这是“疯人院”的一种礼貌说法。

sentences.sentence: All the time that Fillmore was at the château I never once went to see him.
sentences.translation: 菲尔莫住在庄园里时我自始至终没有去看过他。
